attributes.action: rotherhams shaun wright to be removed from his post
attributes.additional_details: 1400 children abused, everybody in power knew. Shaun Wright is now the police commissioner. His brazenness by refusing to step down is downright shocking. A person who failed in his role so gross-fully should not be given any other option but to step down. Please sign how can we trust this man to do anything we cannot.

rejection.details: HMG does not have the power to compel a PCC to resign, nor to remove them from their post.
